export function interpolateTrig(a,b,t){var tsin=(1-Math.cos(Math.PI*t))/2;return a+tsin*(b-a);}export function interpolate(a,b,fraction){return a+fraction*(b-a);}export function randint(a,b){return a+Math.floor(Math.random()*(b-a));}// Flip a coin weighted p for True
export function coinFlip(p){return Math.random()<p;}export function stoc(n){var fn=Math.floor(n);var d=coinFlip(n-fn);if(d==true){return fn+1;}else{return fn;}}
